title: Book Store API
description: A RESTful API enabling users to add, update, delete, and manage books efficiently. Offers smooth search, detailed retrieval, and scalable backend support for web and mobile apps.

title: Hangman Game
description: A modern Hangman game where players guess letters to uncover a hidden word. Features an interactive keyboard, dynamic feedback, and engaging visual gameplay.

title: Fruit Ninja Game with Index Finger Gesture
description: A gesture-controlled Fruit Ninja game using TensorFlow.js and Handpose for finger tracking. Players slice fruits in real time through webcam-based motion detection.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game using Hand Gesture Recognition
description: A real-time Rock-Paper-Scissors game powered by TensorFlow.js hand gesture detection. Offers smooth gameplay with live tracking and AI-based gesture classification.

title: React Cursor
description: A collection of animated and customizable cursor designs built with Next.js and Tailwind. Helps developers enhance UI aesthetics with creative, ready-to-use cursor packs.

title: Expenses Tracker App
description: A simple and clean mobile app to track daily expenses across categories. Provides insights and organized views to help users manage their spending effectively.

title: Portfolio v1
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and achievements. Built with smooth animations and a clean UI for an engaging browsing experience.

title: HackOverFlow2k24 Website
description: A responsive event website for HackOverFlow2k24 built with React and Tailwind. Designed for smooth promotion, registrations, and participant engagement.

title: Code Combat Exam Portal
description: A scalable exam platform supporting 300+ registrations with smooth performance. Lets students take quizzes seamlessly while ensuring stability under high load.

title: SRKRCSE Department Website
description: A departmental website offering access to notes, events, faculty contacts, and academic resources. Designed for easy navigation and a clean, student-friendly interface.

title: Zebronics Watch Landing Page
description: A sleek landing page for a Zebronics smartwatch, highlighting features and design. Built with responsive layouts and smooth interactions for product showcasing.

title: Netflix UI Clone
description: A Netflix-inspired UI clone with responsive design and modern layout. Includes interactive sections, smooth animations, and a clean user experience.

title: Temperature Converter
description: A simple web app to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. Designed with a clean UI for quick and easy temperature calculations.
